spec_data.Name: rubygem-coderay
spec_data.Description:
Coderay is a Ruby library for syntax highlighting. CodeRay is build to be easy
to use and intuitive, but at the same time fully featured, complete, fast and
efficient.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 10:57:58 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Fast syntax highlighter engine for many programming languages
